attributes.action: Please give NHS hospital staff a bigger pay rise than 1%
attributes.additional_details: As Sir Winston Churchill said in 1940 - Never was so much owed by so many to so few
attributes.background: Instruct The Department of Health and Social Care to reconsider their recommended 1% pay rise.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
